content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions on the matter. However, Capcom has taken part in several successful collaborations throughout the years, including:

1. Marvel vs. Capcom series: Capcom's crossover fighting game franchise featuring popular characters from Marvel Comics.

2. Street Fighter X Tekken: A crossover fighting game collaboration with Bandai Namco's Tekken series.

3. Resident Evil x Last Day on Earth: A collaboration between Resident Evil and the mobile game Last Day on Earth that introduced new costumes and weapons to the game.

4. Monster Hunter World x The Witcher 3: A crossover event that introduced Geralt of Rivia, the protagonist of The Witcher series to Monster Hunter World.

It's difficult to determine which is the most successful collaboration, as they've all been successful in their own right. Each collaboration has brought in new audiences and revenue, showcasing Capcom's ability to work with other companies to create successful partnerships.
